Header.title: Dump Ape Shark Tank
Header.paragraph: An NFT-powered pitch competition, bringing the dumbest ideas to life.

paragraphs: Sex toys for pets. Mood rings for the deceased. These are the types of idiotic business ideas we want to help create here at Dumb Ape Shark Tank. Pitch your idea, win, and bring it to life.

paragraphs.text: Dumb Ape Shark Tank is like the popular show Shark Tank, except only for dumb ideas. We use NFTs to determine the participants and voting mechanisms. The dumbest idea wins a prize fund of ETH from the mint sales.

Each Dumb Ape NFT is a ticket. Tickets are your chance to make it into the pitch competition. For those not pitching, they represent your voting rights. Your ticket is worth more or less depending on its attributes. For example, one Dumb Ape might be worth 10 points, while another Ape with rarer attributes might be worth 100. The total number of points you own across all your Apes will determine your probability of getting selected to pitch your idea, and how many votes you have.

40% of sales from NFT minting will be pooled into a prize fund. The winner of the pitch competition, the Ape with the dumbest idea, will receive the entire prize fund in ETH, and the opportunity to bring their idea to life in the real world.

Gallery.title: Bent Over Donkey, Body of Christ Butthole

items.text: In the pre-mint phase, the Dumb Ape team will spread the word and build the community for Dumb Ape Shark Tank. Now is the time to start thinking of dumb business ideas you might want to pitch.
Dumb Ape Shark Tank NFTs will become available to mint in February, 2022. This is when you can start collecting tickets for a chance to pitch your dumbest idea.

We give you about two weeks after the initial mint date before selecting the participants for the pitch competition. This time can be used to mint more NFTs or to purchase rare, already-minted NFTs on secondary markets to increase your chances of being selected.
In March, 2022, we will officially select and announce the NFT holders that get to pitch their dumbest business idea for the chance to win up to 80 ETH.
Once the participants have been contacted and confirmed, they will be given a week to finalize their pitches. Then, pitching and voting will begin.
The community has spoken! The pitch with the most votes for dumbest business idea will win 100% of the Prize Fund.

Team.name: @hardscarf
Team.bio: hardscarf is an AI software engineer with mild arthritis who is fascinated with blockchains' potential to create rich lives in the metaverse. As a child he often cried when he saw dead animals, so he is very excited to be part of a project that champions one.

Team.name: @lilstain
Team.bio: stain is the visionary behind Donkey Hole and an experienced community manager, as well as a former and future degenerate gambler. Since childhood, he has always loved buttholes, claiming they make him "tingly," and gets visibly upset when people refer to them as "the third best hole".

Team.name: @jailbaitpony
Team.bio: jailbaitpony is the only one here with any artistic ability, or more accurately, the only one with an iPad. She was more or less coerced into this project initially, but has since begun to really believe in it. Could be a classic case of Stockholm. She may or may not be underage. Also she may or may not be a girl.
